mapper.select: SELECT umc.tmdb_id, umc.title, umc.original_language, umc.overview, umc.vote_average, umc.vote_count, umc.popularity, umc.poster_path, umc.backdrop_path, mc.created_time FROM user_media_collection mc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT movie_id as media_id, tmdb_id, title as title, original_language, overview, vote_average, vote_count, popularity, poster_path, backdrop_path FROM movies UNION ALL SELECT show_id as media_id, tmdb_id, name as title, original_language, overview, vote_average, vote_count, popularity, poster_path, backdrop_path FROM tv_shows ) umc ON umc.media_id = mc.media_id WHERE mc.user_id = #{userId} AND mc.media_type IN (1, 2) AND mc.created_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
